data.actual_result: Second toast message appears stating "Missing Permissions" despite channel being successfully muted.
data.expected_result: Channel muted, single toast message saying that channel settings have been updated.
data.short_description: Muting a Channel using Channel Settings causes two toast messages to appear
data.steps_to_repro: - Proceed to an unmuted text channel in a server where you do not have permissions to manage channels.  - Open channel settings through the top right menu. - Mute channel.
